## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/addressranges">AddressRanges</a> class helps normalize address range collections.

This class keeps a sorted vector of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/addressrange">AddressRange</a> objects and can perform insertions and searches efficiently. Intersecting(&#91;100,200), &#91;150,300)) and adjacent(&#91;100,200), &#91;200,300)) address ranges are combined during insertion.

Definition at line 121 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/addressranges-h">AddressRanges.h</a>.
